protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturerâ€™s standard protocol

Plants of Arabidopsis growing in short day were treated at day 17th of growth. The treatment was applied with a conventional sprayer. For mock treatments, only distilled water was used. For MSB, 0.2 mM of Menadione sodium bisulphite (SIGMA M5750) was used. The treatments were done approximately 30 minutes after the start of the artificial day.

text: Total RNA was isolated with Trizol (Invitrogen, San Diego, CA, USA) following the manufacturer's recommendation. Following extraction, an additional step of column purification with RNeasy Mini Kit (Qiagen, Valencia, CA, USA) was added to ensure the purity of the RNA.
Plants of Arabidopsis thaliana, ecotype Col-0.
Seeds were sowed in soil and kept at 4 C for 2 days (stratification).
After stratification, the pots are transferred to growth conditions, in a walk-in chamber.
Light from 10 am to 6 pm, at 21 C
Dark from 6 pm to 10 am, at 19 C.
(Parameters: time unit = seconds, temperature unit = C)

protocol.text: The normalization was done with the package "affy" of "R". The function used was "rma(Data)".
